name: Ghost Is Rising
description:
Help a lost spirit find it's way back to the surface to be with their soulmate in eternity.

Avoid the other spirits to maintain a high heart level to get the best ending.
If you lose your heart then you'll fall back down to the beginning.

Controls

Mobile (Web version too, but can also use Else controls):
Tap left screen side: move left
Tap right screen side: move right

Else:
A/Left arrow: move left
D/Right arrow: move right
